```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#attaching packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

# Reading in the data

```{r}
ces <- read.csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

# Sarah creating a geom_point gg plot, Mia changed it to a hexbin plot and updated axes
```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white, y= ces_3_0_score))+
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "Percentage of population that is white",
       y = "CES 3.0 score")
```
